name: ARK: Survival Ascended by GSH, API included!
description: ARK is reimagined from the ground-up into the next-generation of video game technology with Unreal Engine 5! Form a tribe, tame & breed hundreds of unique dinosaurs and primeval creatures, explore, craft, build, and fight your way to the top of the food-chain. Your new world awaits!
author: servers@gameservershub.com

name: boiii
description:
Run a BOIII dedicated server.

Note: Installation slimming is enabled by default, removing the pre-installed multiplayer maps. This is to reduce the size of the server. You can disable this and have all multiplayer maps installed by default. It's recommended to keep this installed and manually add the maps you want.
author: stefanukpadd@gmail.com

name: IW4M Admin
description:
Manage many Plutonium, X-Labs, and BOIII servers with one IW4MA instance! To connect to the web front, use the panel IP:Port or the ManualWebfrontUrl within IW4MAdminSettings.json

Note: You need to manually add and configure each server to IW4MAdminSettings.json
author: stefanukpadd@gmail.com
